inn1.comm: short of length, outside the off stump, climbs chest-high, on the off stump line, Sehwag gets behind the line to defend to off side. Two slips in place
There comes the upper-cut. Short again but this time there was some width on offer and Sehwag went back and across and slashed it away to thirdman region.
back to the nagging line on the off stump, coming in, Sehwag, taking a middlestump guard, is behind the line and defends.
Carved over point. Sehwag is not wasting any time. Again not much risk as it was short and wide, Sehwag has no hesitation in flaying it over point.
fuller, closer to the off stump and Sehwag covers the off stump and lets it fly past him. Two fours already in the first over.
full in length, on the middle line, Sehwag is behind it and defends like Gavaskar. Head over the ball, left elbow high and feet gliding back to get behind the line.
beaten. In the zone outside off stump, shaping away ever so slightly and Jayasuriya pushes at, bat inside the line.
full-pitched, on the off stump line, dug away to the off side.
again full and outside off stump - perfect line and length, and Jayasuriya shoulders arms.
again on that line, Jayasuriya moves towards the line, pushes it out towards point.
in the corridor, Jayasuriya is not interested in flirting
beaten again The over ended the way it started. The ball rushing past the outside edge. It was on a length, outside off and it straightened; Jayasuriya had a stab but ...
full-pitched, on the off and middle, Sehwag bottom-hands it away towards mid on

Stunner from Kemp at second slip. Sehwag is gone. It kicked up from short of length, on the off stump line, Sehwag tries to punch it through the line, gets an outside edge and it flies low to the right of Kemp who dives to grab it inches off the turf. The camera pans to a girl in the crowd. She is shocked. "Out aa??", she screams as her hands cover her mouth in disbelief. The crowd-puller is gone. The heat has gone up

hits the deck short of length, on the leg stump line, kicks up the ribs, Tharanga takes out the bottom-hand off the handle, tries to fend it away but the ball evades the blade and rams into the ribcage. Jayasuriya goes across for a chat.
beaten. Short of length, on the leg and middle and it moves across Tharanga who puts his bat as a defensive shield but the ball goes right across it.
again some extra bounce. Moving across Tharanga, who drops his wrists, gets his bat out of the way and sways away from the line. 140 k delivery.
around the off stump, again movement away, Tharanga pushes, gets a outside edge towards back ward point
full and on the leg stump line, tickled away to fine-leg region

short of length, on the off stump line, slight movement away and Tharanga pushes inside the line with soft hands, gets a outside edge but it falls well short of the slip fielder. Impressive start from Ongondo.
on the middle and leg, tickled to the on side for a single
outside off and Jayasuriya respects the line and length; shoulders arms
leans forward to defend a length-delivery

Hello? Maximum. Crashing pull shot. Slightly short in length, on the leg and middle, enough for Jayasuriya to unfurl his short-arm jab. The white ball flies over long leg, into the middle of delighted fans. Jayasuriya has begun to warm-up.
full in length, on the off stump line, shapes away and again Tharanga looks a bit iffy as he pushes inside the line and gets a outside edge to third man
on a length, just outside off stump, Jayasuriya wants to flay it through the off side but goes too hard at it and it rolls over to mid off

Another one flies over the ropes. This time over cover. Full-pitched outside off and Jayasuriya leans forward and flays it over cover. Stunning. Morne looks a bit shocked. Welcome to the world of Jayasuriya.

loud shout for a catch down the leg side. It landed short, kicked up at the ribs, Jayasuriya shuffles inside, tries to tuck it away. There must have been some noise, could have hit the gloves. The extra slow mo shows that there was some contact with the glove.
again at the ribs, the bottom-hand comes off, and fends it away to the on side. Good comeback from Morne after that six.
shortish, on the off and middle, defended to the off side
Tharanga breaks the shackles with a cut through point. Again it was short in length, a touch outside off stump and he cuts it away

Gotcha! Jayasuriya holes out to long leg. Quite similar to the one that he spanked for a six- again short and at the ribs, Jayasuriya swivels and short-arm pulls it straight to the man in the deep. The openers are back in the hut.
on the off stump line, steered to point
beaten Tharanga continues to play and miss. Another one in the temptation zone outside off and Tharanga, again, pushes inside the line.
on the off stump line, not much movement away and Tharanga manages to get bat on ball, steers towards point
beaten again. In that zone and Tharanga has a flash and a miss.
short in length, on the middle and leg, worked to square leg . The pitch is offering good bounce. Morne is working up quite a good pace. In the 140's.
hits the deck short of length, climbs up on the off stump line, deflected to third man
full-pitched, on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj stays back, gets close to the line, wrists it away to right of square leg
full and on the off stump line, guided to point
on the middle and leg line, defended to mid on

clean, crisp and smooth. Could be a cigarette ad but I am refering to the on drive. It was full in length, on the middle and Yuvraj leant forward and caressed it down the ground, between the bowler and the mid on.
gets it left of mid on this time, couple of runs to his kitty.
short in length, on the hips, tucked away behind square leg
short and on the leg and middle, Tharanga pulls, making sure he hits it to the ground, and gets a single down to long leg
full and outside off, Tharanga goes for a drive, misses, bat hits the ground and the ball settles inside Boucher's gloves
leans forward, pushes a length-delivery towards mid off and steals a quick single
short in length, on the off stump line, Yuvraj stands tall, gets on top of the bounce, keeps it down in front of him
short again, on the middle and leg this time, Yuvraj tries to clip it away to the on side, doesn't make proper contact and the ball rolls in front of him
full and well outside off stump - the sucker ball, but Yuvraj resists the urge to have a go.
drifting on to the pads and Yuvraj flicks it away to fine leg. Easy as they come.
full and outside off, pushed to cover where Sibanda makes the stop
full and outside off, driven to mid off

Another stunner from the Africans. This time it is AB de Villiers. Short and outside off, Tharanga carves it to left of de Villiers. at point,  who takes a step and goes airborne and watches the ball sail into his cupped palms.
full in length, on the off stump line, Yousuf glides forward, steers to cover point
on the middle and off, Yousuf drives pleasingly towards mid on
off cutter, on the leg side, Yousuf flicks it away behind square leg
right on money first ball. Full and on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
fuller, on the middle, driven to left of mid on
on the off stump line, defended to the off side

short in length, on the middle stump line, Yuvraj punches it on the up, knives it through the line and it goes in the air but through the gap between the bowler and mid on. It looked a mere punch but so purrfectly timed. Lovely bat speed.
driven to midwicket
good length outside off stump and he leans across and steers it to de Villiers at backward point
width on offered but he doesnt cash in, ends up chopping into the ground and Boucher runs up to do the fielding
slower and fuller on off stump, Yousuf on-drives to the fielder at mid-on
aggression doesnt pay this time, as he comes down the track and drives one straight into the hands of mid-on inside the circle to give Ongondo his third!
back of a length delivery just outside off stump and he gets over it in defense
similar delivery which he taps back down the track for Ongondo to collect
he goes astray, pitching one outside leg and Yuvraj just helps it on its was with fine leg up in the circle
good length outside off stump, he bends down and defends to point
short of a length outside off stump and Yuvraj is deceived by the pace, driving with one hand in the air towards mid-off, who's now back
middle and leg line, worked to midwicket
he pushes forward lazily to a fuller one and the ball darts back between bat and pad for four
good length outside off stump and he drives towards cover
short of a length outside off stump and he defends to point
short and wide and he cuts it straight to de Villiers at backward point
good length ball which he drives to mid-off and Kemp dives to stop
much straighter delivery on off stump, he drives straight back and Chigumbura fields to his left
straighter on the stumps and he on-drives wide of mid-on this time, Dippenaar moves quickly and cuts off the second
bouncer down leg stump, Yuvraj ducks, and the umpire calls it a wide
short of a length moving away from middle and leg, he gets up tall and plays it down to leg and Jayawardene calls for the single
on a length, around middle and leg, punched to mid on.
leans forward and defends a length-delivery to the on side.

bang. The stumps at the opposite end are flattenned by Yuvi's drive. It was short in length, on the off line and Yuvraj knives through the line. The portly Parker jumps out of the way but he needn't have bothered, the stumps took the blow
dug in short, at the ribs, tucked to short fine leg
fullish, on the middle and leg, driven to mid on
Whack. Short in length, bit of width outside off and Yuvraj says thankyou and carves it past point.
on the off stump line, gentle seam-up stuff, patted gently to the off side.
on the middle and that wristy subcontinental shot comes into play and the ball runs away to long leg
full, straight, Yuvraj drives down the pitch, Kemp makes the stop, threatens to throw, Yuvraj gets back in a hurry. The crowd roar. They are bored I guess.
full again, on the off and driven through the off side
fullish, on the middle, Mahela leans forward, wrists it away past midwicket.
tired of being wristed away, Kemp shifts the line to outside off and is driven to cover
short in length, on the middle, moves towards off, Yuvraj is squared-up slightly, pushes it out to the off side
uncomfortable short one, on the throat, Yuvraj takes eyes off the ball, pulls ungainly towards square leg. Hmm...
slightly short in the length, pulled away past square leg

Another one goes down. Dragged on. Short in length, outside off, Yuvraj's bat comes down outside the line as he tries to force it away off the back foot, gets a inside edge and the timber is disturbed.
fullish, driven down the ground
on a length, outside off , left alone
on a length, on the off stump line, pushed back to Kemp who lunges across to his right to make the stop.
full-pitched outside off stump, driven to mid off
slower, on the middle and off, Mahela checks his drive, turns it away towards midwicket
full and outside off, bit of a floater and Mahela goes down on his knee and square-drives it past point. Holds his pose and watches the stroke. Yeah Yeah Mahela it was quite a good stroke.
on the off stump line, worked to midwicket
fuller, on the off stump line, driven to mid off
slower one, full and on the off stump line, driven to right of mid on
worked through midwicket for a single
slightly short and Mahela swivels off the front foot and pulls it crisply behind square leg. Cracker of a stroke.
on the off stump line, punched away to cover
floats one outside off, Dhoni lunges forward, pushes it to cover
turns in from outside off, defended on the front foot. Bit of bat and bit of pad involved.
full and on the middle, Dhoni chooses to go back, works it to midwicket
loopy delivery, outside off, Dhoni shapes to off drive, gets a inside edge to the on side
eases forward, drives to cover
fuller, on the off, driven back to the bowler
full-pitched on the off stump, driven to mid off
slightly short in length, outside the off stump, cut away to third man
short in length, outside off, forced away through cover
short and rising, pulled away past square leg
fullish, on the middle and leg, driven down to long on and he will retain the strike.
tossed up well outside off, Mahela can't reach it as he tries to square drive
turns in from outside off, Mahela walks across, works it to midwicket
flighted delivery, another drive but again Pollock at midwicket comes in the way
full and outside off stump, eased down to long on
full and outside off, Dhoni lunges forward, tries to work it to on side, gets a leading edge back down the track .
full and on the middle, turned to the on side. Morne had put in a very good first spell; extracted considerable lift and pace off the track
short in length, on the off stump, pushed to off side
Classy on drive. Fullish, on the middle and leg, Jayawardene leans forward to caress it to through midwicket region.
Here comes a pleasing off drive. Full-pitched on the off stump line, Mahela caresses it through wide mid-off. Elegant. Stylish.
gets behind the line of a length-delivery and defends
turns in from off, pulled away to midwicket
tossed-up, making Dhoni lunge forward and he drives back to the bowler
quicker, turns from off stump, punched to cover
on the off stump line, Dhoni leant forward, flicks it away to short fine leg region
tossed-up, on the middle, Mahela tries to sweep but doesn't connect properly
low full toss, driven to long on
full and on the middle and leg, turned to the on side
full-pitched, on the off stump line, driven to sweeper cover
back of length, outside the off stump, Dhoni eases back, opens the bat-face, guides to third man
beaten. Short of length, in the zone outside off stump, Mahela decides rather late - may be the heat is getting to him, to go for a late cut
comes down the track, Botha drags back the length and Dhoni adjusts to work it past midwicket
on the middle line, turning in and Mahela walks right across to the off stump, gets outside the line and flicks it away to fine leg region.
flighted, slow in the air, outside off, pushed down to long on

almost caught and bowled. Flighted delivery, outside the off stump, not much turn, Dhoni tries to swat it to on side, gets a leading edge and the ball is in the air but falls short of the diving bowler
Cute. Tossed-up on the leg stump line and Dhoni plays a vertical sweep. Thumps it down through fine-leg region
floated outside off stump, short in length and Mahela puts it away with ease: leans back to cut it past point. Too easy.
fullish, on the middle and off and Jayawardene drives to long on
slightly short again and again outside off stump and where Mahela caressed it past point, Dhoni chose to force it away through extra cover. Clubbed away.
like Mahela, Dhoni takes a single down to long on
on the off stump line, worked to midwicket
outside off stump, Mahela has again shuffled right across, to get outside the line and flicks it away, with the turn, to fine leg
spins down the leg side, Mahela fails to connect his attempted flick, and Boucher fails to gather. To Boucher's dismay it has been given as byes and not as wides.
tossed-up, outside off stump, driven to long off
short in length, pulled away to long leg
flighted full, driven to long off
outside the off stump, bit of bounce too but Mahela adjusts beautifully, arches back, cuts it late down to the third man region.
on the middle, flicked away past square leg
floated outside off, driven through extra cover

Cute and classy. Again on a length, just outside off and Mahela glides back, makes room, waits for the ball before tapping it away to thirdman boundary. Of course had he nicked it I would have written, too cute for his own comfort.
spins in from outside off, Dhoni goes back, forces it away to cover
fuller, on the middle and leg, Dhoni is hanging on the back foot, waits for the delivery before turning it past square leg
slightly short and on the leg and Dhoni pounces on to that one: Rocks back to pull it away in front of square
drifting on to the legs, thumped away to fine leg
another late-cut from Mahela. It's a pleasant deja-vu.
full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover
wayward delivery down the leg side
short of a good length delivery, defended on the front-foot and the ball rolls back to the bowler
again pushed back to the bowler
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven off the front-foot, fails to get it past the fielder at mid-off
fuller lenght delivery outside the off stump, Jayawardene leans forward and drives it through the gap between cover and point
punched through cover point, easy single and that's his fifty - one day he is going to get bored
in the slot and that's neatly driven to long-off for an easy single
bit of extra bounce but wide outside the off stump to trouble the batsman, Jayawardene stands tall on the back-foot and taps it away behind point
short of a good length delivery, defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back down the track
short rising delivery, cutting in but not enough to make Dhoni play at it
good length delivery outside the off stump, Dhoni has a waft at it and the ball races away off the inside edge of the bat to the fine leg fence, lucky runs
worked away on the off side
bouncer, bit wide outside the off stump and Dhoni leaves it through to the keeper
better line and length, too close to free his arms and Dhoni is made to defend
puched off the back-foot in typical Dhoni fashion, the walking on the water routine - easy single to deep cover
steered down to third man and they cross over
slightly short in length, Dhoni goes back to punch it away to cover
bit of width outside off ,cut away through backward point
full-pitched, on the middle and off, driven to long on
brutal hit but Ongondo at mid off throws himself at the delivery. It was full and outside off, Dhoni drilled it to the right of mid off where Ongondo did well to make the stop
short and pulled away just behind square leg, Morne moves to right at the deep to make a neat sliding stop. It is hot, he has had two spells and yet the committment to stop.
overpitched, on the stumps and Mahela caresses it down the ground for a single
on the off stump line, punched down the ground towards long on
on the off and middle, short in length, Dhoni walks across, laps it around the corner but can't beat the man in short fine leg
fullish, on the off stump line, pushed to cover
short of length, outside off stump, Dhoni goes back, forces it to sweeper cover
slower, full and straight on the off, Mahela checks his shot, pushes it to mid on
comes down the track, drives to long on
tossed-up, outside off, driven sweetly to deep cover
on the middle and off, tapped to the on side
fuller, quicker, Dhoni stays where he is, drives to long on
another single down to long on
on the off stump and Dhoni will keep the strike with a push-drive to long off . 14 overs to go.
slightly short, outside off, cut away to deep cover
flighted up, outside off, Mahela leans forward, waits and drives to long off
ooh... flighted delivery goes wrong, ends up as a loopy full-toss, outside off, Dhoni is equally surprised and only manages to drive it straight to long off
full and outside off, Mahela goes down on his knee and square drives through backward point.
dropped by Boucher. Floated well outside off, Mahela reaches for it, tries to late-cut, nicks it but Boucher fails to hold on
driven to long on for a single
faster one on the leg side but Dhoni is alert,  plays a vertical sweep through the fine leg region
comes down the track, drives to long on.
Mahela rotates the strike back to DHoni with a dab towards point. Both past their fifties and playing really well.
full-toss, swatted to long on
full and on the stumps, drilled to long on
Yet another late-cut from Mahela. Backs away, making room, and dabs it from front of the off stump
goes for a quicker one, ends up dragging it short and on the pads, Mahela just laps it around the corner, past the man at short fine leg
Mahela is on the attack. Leans forward to a flighted delivery and drives inside-out over extra cover. Fab stroke.
low dipping full-toss, on the middle,driven to long on
There comes the biggie. Dhoni charges down the track, to the pitch of a flighted delivery outside off and heaves it over deep midwicket
fuller, aiming for the blockhole, Dhoni plays his unique bottom-hand powered thumping drive down the ground.
slightly short, outside off, Dhoni goes back, punches it away to deep cover
spins down the leg side
tossed-up, outside off,  Mahela leans forward, scoops it to wide long on
Thwack. Another charge down the track, another heave across the line; the deep midwicket boundary is being peppered here by Dhoni.
full and on the middle and leg, Mahela shuffles across, plays a neat pick-up shot to long leg
Wide down the leg side, Dhoni tries to lap it away, gets a glove to it but Parker signals wides.
full and on the middle and leg, Dhoni leans forward, wrists it away to deep fine leg. Four more. Runs are coming in a flood.
short and on the off stump, Dhoni rocks back, punches it to sweeper cover
on the off and middle, fisted away to long on
flighted delivery, on the off stump line, flicked away to deep square leg
Violence continues. Charges down the track and drills straight down the ground
Dhoni is not a Gandhian. Another brutal hit. Another war-dance down the track and the bottom-hand comes into play as he lifts one over long on.
slightly short, Dhoni shifts his weight back and swats it  away to deep cover
dabs to cover region for a single
oh ho! a reverse sweep. The Asian boys are having a party. Mahela reverse sweeps a flighted delivery through backward point
on the off stump line, pushes forward in defence, runs off the pad to the off side
I don't know why de Villiers is bowling in the slog overs. Gentle seam-up stuff on the leg and middle, Mahela shuffles across, plays a pick-up shot and er ... it flies over long leg.
fuller, on the middle and off, driven to long off
backs away to leg side, exposing the stumps, Botha keeps it full and on the middle, punched to cover
leans forward, flicks a flighted delivery to deep midwicket
slower in the air, flighted delivery on the off stump, Mahela is made to wait and he pushes it to cover
another slow one, not giving pace for the batsman to work with, patted past point

Dhoni takes guard well outside leg stump, Botha keeps his cool, follows him, really slow in the air, a doosra, not much pace to work with again, and Dhoni lunges forward to push it through mid off. Botha and Dhoni have a friendly chat about Dhoni's guard. Both are laughing.
flicked past square leg
moves to 99, another drive to long on
low full toss, on the off stump line, Dhoni brings the 200 of the partnership with a punched-drive through extra cover
Short one, on the middle and Dhoni swivels to pull it to deep square leg. Mahela on 99, Dhoni on 97
Jayawardene gets there first. Another elegant drive down the ground. Hands aloft. The crowd are on their feet. Dhoni comes across, hugs his captain. A happy dressing room as well.
almost at the blockhole, dug out to mid off
Dhoni moves to 98 with a drive down the ground

again he stands outside leg stump, the ball is on the leg stump line, Dhoni forces it through extra cover and comes back for the second run. That's his 100. The crowd look pretty pleased. Mathew informs me that Dhoni's century is the fastest in Chennai. In international cricket ie. Don't ping me with your gully cricket exploits in west mylapore
Skips down the track, reaches the pitch of a tossed-up delivery, and lofts inside out over widish long off. Classy strike. Effortless.
flatter, outside off stump, flat-batted heave to deep midwicket
short in length, Dhoni shapes to pull, top-hand comes off the sweaty handle and the ball runs away to long leg

Against the run of play, Mahela falls. Moves outside leg stump, giving himself some room, but slices a full-pitched delivery on the off stump straight to point. The crowd get on their feet to applaud. The players do the same in the dressing room.
digs it short, at the ribs, Mortaza fends it away to the off side and they rob a single
yorker, on the leg stump line, jabbed away to midwicket
bouncer, Mortaza attempts to pull but can't connect. Mornie continues to be impressive.
fuller one this time, just outside off, Mortaza has a flash and a miss.
It was above waist-high full toss, at the body and Dhoni swats it away. Hold on that was some swat. The ball has gone up and over long leg
Goes down on his knee and clubs a fullish delivery straight down the ground. A tired Dippenaar fails to stop it near the ropes.
It gets more interesting. A miscue for a six. Another low full toss, outside off stump and Dhoni plays a forehand slog, doesn't time it well but hey it has disappeared over long on.
banged in short, on the off stump line and Mortaza has a heave across the line, doesn't time well and balloons it to deep midwicket region
Dhoni charges down the track, the bowler drags back the length, pushed towards mid on for a single
full, at the blockhole, Dhoni drives back to Morne who has a direct hit at the striker's end and Dhoni, who was inside the crease, will take the overthrow
Agony for Morne. The attempted yorker ends up as a full toss on the legs, Harbhajan glances it away.
Joy for Morne. A length-delivery crashes through the defence of Harbhajan and knocks out the bails on the leg stump.
another length-delivery, just outside off, Rafique tries to run it down to thirdman but no wood on the ball.
makes contact this time but steers straight to point
And again. Morne completes his quota. Considering the heat, the pitch and the marauding Asian batsmen, he has done rather well.

Another six. Almost a deja-vu. Full toss, on the legs, Dhoni swings it imperiously over long leg. Matthew: "The last two days have witnessed a run-feast in Chennai. Three out of the four highest totals in ODIs in Chennai have come from the three innings that have taken place so far."
pulls to long leg, Rafique wants a single, Dhoni wants the strike. Dhoni wins.
That's why. Whack the ball contest continues. Short in length, on the stumps and Dhoni carves it over midwicket
ANd it does get better or, if you are an African, worse. Low full-toss, on the legs and Dhoni paddle-sweeps it, yeah I got that right, to fine leg boundary. Ala Ashraful.
on the middle and leg, Dhoni wanted to send it out of Chennai, gets a inside edge on to the pad and out towards square-leg. He runs hard, Rafique responds and they get two.

inn2.comm: de Villiers starts off with a boundary. Leans forward to a length-delivery from Asif and drove it through extra cover
swings well outside the off stump. Wide called.
on the off stump line, worked to midwicket for a single
length-delivery on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
outside the off stump, leaves it alone
short in length, outside the off stump, cut uppishly to thirdman
around the off stump, on a length, pushed to cover
length-delivery on the off stump line, Sibanda pushes inside the line, gets a outside edge to thirdman
on the off stump line, pushed to cover
full and on the legs, flicked away to long leg.
drifting on  to the pads, nudged away to fine leg
on the middle line, Sibanda stabs at it, gets a inside edge to fine leg
lands on a length, just outside off, holds its line, Sibanda shapes to leave it but can't get the bat out of line in time, gets a outside edge to third man
Sweetly timed. It was full in length, outside the off stump, Siband leant forward and hit on the up, through backward point. Lovely punch at the point of impact.
on the off stump line, guided to Yuvraj at point
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
Cracker of a shot. Full-pitched, outside the off stump and Sibanda eases forward to knife it through extra cover. Fab stroke. Asif looks bemused.
full and outside off stump, sliced away to widish third man
on the off stump line, punched down the track
lands on a length, on the off stump, straightens, de Villiers is squared-up a touch, pushes it out to cover point
Slightly short in length and de Villiers latches on to it; pulls it over midwicket
homing in on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
on the off stump line, from a length, turned to midwicket
short of length, outside the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
on the middle line, on a length, worked to midwicket
in the zone outside off, left alone
nagging line continues; another one on the off stump line, from a good length, defended on the front foot
beaten. In the temptation zone, Sibanda has a lame poke
on the off and middle, Sibanda gets behind the line, punches it to cover
on a length, around the off and middle, Sibana pats it to the off side
Mortaza continues to get it spot on. Another one, around the off stump, pushed back down the track and Mortaza dives to his right to make the stop. Sehwag comes over to pat him on the back.
tight over comes to an end. Again on that off stump line, another dot ball results.
on the middle line, slightly short in length, short-arm jab past square-leg
lands on a length, on the middle line, stabbed away to the on side
slower ball. Full and on the off stump line, pushed to the on side
banged in short, goes way over the batsman's head and down the leg side
streaky edge through the vacant gully region. Kicks up from short of length, Sibanda pushes hard at it and gets a outside edge
comes in from outside off, pushed towards mid on for a single. Harbhajan cuts across from midwicket but can't prevent the single
on a length, on the off stump line, jabbed away to cover
full-pitched, on the middle, driven to mid on
fullish, on the middle and leg, flicked away to Harbhajan at midwicket
slips down leg side and de Villiers tickles it fine. Rafique da gets across from long leg, throws in a dive but slides over the ropes along with the ball. Good effort though.
length-delivery, just outside off, edged away to thirdman
full and swinging away, well outside the off stump and Sibanda leans across, slices it through point

dug it in short , Sibanda shapes to pull, runs off the pad behind square-leg . Tharanga, the acting keeper, gets across, has a shy at non-striker's end. It misses the stumps and goes right to the long off boundary
short of length, outside the off stump, de Villiers fists through the line, on the up, through cover
on the stumps, defended away. This is an extra delivery. The heat must be the getting to the umpire Hill. Everyone makes a mistake.
on the hips, tucked away to deep fine leg. Once again Rafique runs hard to make the stop. He is 37, it's pretty humid out there but tremendous spirit shown. Mortaza applauds the effort.
slower one, fullish, driven to Sehwag at short cover
homing in on the off stump, pushed to the off side
full and on the pads, attempted flick fails and the ball runs off the pad
short in length, outside the off stump, forced away to cover
length-delivery, on the off, driven to mid off
lands on a length, just outside off, goes on straight, pushed to cover
banged in short, on the off stump line, Sibanda shapes to pull but is beaten for pace
de Villiers shuffles inside the line and clips a short of length delivery on the middle and leg to fine leg boundary.
shifts his line to the off stump and de Villiers has to be contend pushing it back to the bowler
full and outside off, de Villiers lets it fly past him
tight line continues. On the off stump, from a good length, de Villiers punches it back to Mortaza.
Cracker. Slightly short in length, on the middle and leg, and de Villiers plays a lovely short-arm pull over long leg.
length-delivery on the off stump, pushed to mid off
banged in short. Too short and it sails over the batsman's head
short of length, outside off, pushed to mid off
on the off stump line, steered to point
beaten. lands on a length, on the off stump, shapes away a touch, Sibanda lunges across, pokes at it and the ball rushes past the outside edge
lands on a length, on the off, goes on straight, defended on the front foot
streaky. Top edge over slips. Slightly short in length, on the off stump line, de Villiers goes for a pull but ...
Meaty blow this time. That flew straight from the sweet spot. Short again and de Villiers lifts it over wide midwicket
full and wide outside the off stump, wafted away to backward point
lands on a length, cuts back in, de Villiers is cramped up, jabs it away
from round the stumps, on the leg stump line, it thuds into the pad as Sibanda tries to flick it away
charges down the track, Rafique drags back the length, Sibanda has a wild swing, gets a inside edge on to the pad
leans forward, drives to long off
lands outside off, turns slightly, guided to short third man
drifts in on the middle, defended on the front foot
quicker. fuller, on the legs, flicked away to long leg . Drinks break.
uses his feet well and drives down the ground to long on. 50! for de Villiers
driven to extra-cover
a long hop, de Villiers puts it away over deep midwicket fence
worked to the on side for couple of runs
cut away off the back foot to deep cover, bad throw gives away two more runs
pushes nicely through the in-field to deep cover
played to the off side
smashed away through the fielder at extra-cover to the fence
driven back to the bowler
moves forward and pushes to backward-point
works to short fine leg
driven to Yuvraj at mid on
swept to deep backward square leg..not a well timed sweep
this time he gets the sweep wide off the fielder at fine leg for couple of runs
worked to the on side
looking to work it to the on side, the ball takes the pad and falls on the track
driven down the ground to long on
Rafique strikes, looking to go over the extra-cover....gets the outside edge and goes to short thirdman...Mortaza walks a few feet and takes the catch low down
Two in two balls.....goes first ball. Dippenaar was looking to drive the ball through the extra-cover, can only mistime the shot straight into the hands of Yuvraj at extra-cover
denies the hat-trick, driven through the off side
almost another wicket, gets the outside edge...just drops short of the first slip
tossed up delivery, uses his feet well and drives in the air just over the long on fence for maximum
uses his feet once again, miscues to square leg
looks to sweep from middle...misses it, off the pad to the on side
doosra.. played back to the bowler
driven down the ground to long on for a single
calls of catch it....off the pad the ball lobs up on the on side, Dhoni takes it and appeals..."NO" says the umpire
comes down the track, mistimes a drive to midwicket
slides in on the off stump, cut to point
fires it in quicker as he sees Sibanda come down the track and it has been punched to point
lands on the off and middle, hastens on straight, Sibanda shapes to cut but is cramped for room and hurried by the skidder, just manages to push it to off side
leanws forward to drive to long off
beaten. Peach of a delivery. Drifts in the air, on the off stump line, and then turns away sharply
starts off with a low full-toss, on the off stump, driven to mid off
attempted yorker turns into a low full toss, driven to cover
length-delivery, on the off stump line, pushes at it, gets a outside edge to point
right up there, on the off stump line, jabbed away to cover
low full toss, on the off stump line, driven down the ground, past the bowler. Mortaza givesa valiant chase but can't push the ball back in time
Floated full and well outside the off stump, drilled through extra cover. 138 for 2. 194 required from 167 balls

Rafique da strikes. He saw Sibanda, who played really well for his 45, charging, dragged back the length, just outside off to beat the bat and Dhoni did the rest. Triple-strike by Rafique has pegged back Africa's progress.
slides outside off, left alone
slower in the air, on the off stump, jabbed away to fine leg. Rafique is varying his pace nicely.
floated outside off, Tikolo is almost early into his drive, checks and pushes it to backward point
floated on the leg and middle, slow in the air, stabbed away by Tikolo
lands on a length, outside off, shapes in a touch, pushed to cover
homing in on the off stump, Kemp pushes forward in defence
And again.
in the zone outside off, keeps a tad low and Kemp covers the off stump and lets it go through to Dhoni
on the middle line, on a length, Kemp leans forward, places it right of mid on for a single.

huge shout for lbw. Arm-ball on the middle and leg, Kemp pushes forward in defence, misses and it thuds into the pad. It might have taken out the leg stump but Hill, and he is the one that matters, doesn't think so
on the leg and middle, single to fine leg
on the off stump, driven to cover
slower, on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
lands outside off, turns away, left alone
flighted delivery, spins in from outside off stump, Kemp pushes it to the off side
spin and bounce. Kemp is beaten by the extra bounce and is hit on the thigh pad as he pushes forward to defend
loopy delivery, spinning down the leg side, Kemp tries to flick, might have got a edge but Dhoni moving down the leg side is unable to gather cleanly.
again turn and bounce, yet again Kemp is hit on the pad as he pushes forward
goes back, clips a slightly short of length delivery past square leg
from round the stumps, full and on the middle, driven to cover
deja-vu
comes down the track, takes it on the full and drives to long on
slides in, on the middle, Kemp gets a inside edge to behind square while defending forward
comes down the track, drives but Kemp gets in the way and the ball thuds into his boot and goes towards the stumps
retains the strike with a drive to long off
almost holed up to long on. Charges down the track, chips it uppishly but falls short of the man in the deep
full and on the middle, placed towards mid on
comes out again, gets in a tangle while attempting to flick across the line and is rapped on the pad

Fab doosra. Tikolo is beaten comprehensively. It landed just outside off stump, Tikolo lunges forward, dragging his feet out of the crease while playing for the one turning in but it goes the other way and Dhoni whips the bails off in time.
on the middle and leg, driven inside out to long off
Kemp pings long on
sliding outside off stump, Boucher shapes to cut and gets a outside edge through thirdman
drifts in on the middle, punched to cover
leans forward to defend
goes back, whips it to midwicket
flighted delivery on the off stump, driven to right of Harbhajan
tossed-up, on the middle, driven back to Harbhajan
flighted up, outside off, square driven to point where Sehwag moves to his right to make a diving stop
punches back down the track and Jayasuriya lunges to his right to make the stop
paddle sweeps a full toss for two runs
arm-ball, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
on the middle and off, driven back to the bowler

Dhoni is on a roll here! Boucher steps out in an effort to work the ball away towards square leg but fails to make contact and the ball rolls behind off the pad, Dhoni stretches across to his left, gathers the ball with his left hand and drags the ball on to the stumps. Boucher tried his best to get back in but he is just short of his crease. This is glove work at its best
defended down on the leg side
quicker delivery, defended on the back-foot
worked away well in front of point and they scamper through for a single
easy single to mdiwicket
sharp turn, defended on the back-foot
punched down to long on for an easy single
defended down on the off side, no room for a single there
driven through cover point, runs hard and comfortably comes back for the second
coming in with the arm and Pollock is troubled by the extra bounce, ball rolls away off the pad
another tight delivery, Pollock is struggling a bit here to get the ball off the square
end of a fine over
on the middle and leg, jabbed away to the on side
comes down the track, Harbhajan drags back the length and Kemp pushes it back to the bowler
pushed  away to long on for a single
spins in from outside off, punched to left of Harbhajan who makes a neat diving stop
runs down the track and swings it over wide long on. 14th six of the game.
goes along the ground, picks a singele to long on
comes down the track again but mistimes a intended lofted drive to long on
full and outside off, drilled to long off
floated well outside off, Kemp reaches across, flat-bats it over wide long on. 15th six. It has been quite a six-orgy out there!
right up there, almost a yorker, stabbed out to the leg side
slightly short in length, dabbed away to the on side
goes back, waits for the spin and flicks it away past square leg
fires in that quicker as he sees Kemp trying to charge out and the ball has been pushed to cover
full and down the leg side, faster one, Kemp tries to sweep but misses.
on the leg side, brushes the pad as Kemp fails to connect with another sweep.
turned past midwicket
full and straight, driven to long on
low full-toss, on the off and middle, carved to left of long on where Mortaza makes a nice stop, running dangerously close to the rope
slides in quick, on the leg and middle and Kemp is struck on the pad
The white ball has been flying around everywhere this night. Tossed-up, full, on the middle and leg and Kemp leant forward and scooped it right over long on.
on the off and middle, driven to long off
Pollock retains the strike with a drive to long on. 10 runs came in that over.
lands just outside off, slides in a touch, Pollock tries to lap it around the corner and is sturck on the thigh pad
on the middle and off, punched to cover point
Kemp goes down town. Maximum. Runs down the track and lofts it cleanly over long on. 17th six. TV informs that it is the record number in Indian soil
slightly short and Pollock rocks back to pull it to wide midwicket. Everyone is leaking runs.
on the middle line, turned to midwicket
yorker, on the middle and off, jabbed away to extra cover
backs away, carves a short of length delivery on the middle to deep cover
short, too short, outside off and Kemp hauls it over wide midwicket for another boundary
Kemp is turning it on here. Full and on the middle, he just stands there and deposits it over long on. Another one disappears over the ropes.
full and on the middle, driven towards mid on, Sehwag moves across from midwicket and fires in a direct hit at the non-stirker's end but Pollock is well in
that was quick. Slided in on the middle and leg, Kemp did the well to keep it out
slightly short in length, outside off, cut to deep point
slider on the middle, Pollock is out of the crease looking for a hit, gets a inside-edge on to his pad
gets a single with a drive to long on
full and just outside off, driven to long off. Fifty up for the fiery Kemp.  That was a good tight over from the veteran Rafique.
yorker on the off stump, Kemp's bat comes down in a hurry, makes contact and the ball rolls back to Asif.
another one, at the blockhole, driven back at the bowler who stops it with his left boot. Asif is in some pain. Play held up.
Another biggie. Fiery Kemp keeps Africa afloat. In the slot, on a driveable length and Kemp sends it into the stands at long on.
low full-toss, on the off and middle, driven to long off
low full toss, on the off and middle, driven to long off where the substitute fielder misfields it and theyget an extra run
bangs it short and it sails harmlessly over Pollock. Dot ball though.
on the leg stump line, driven to midwicket
single down to long leg. The rate is climbing up.
backs away, Rafique fires it full and straight, outside off, driven to Asif at long off where Asif makes another stop with his left boot. Hmm..

oh ho! Another six. Lovely swing of the bat. Full and in the slot and he lifts it up and over long on. The bat is broken! Change of bat for Kemp. When my bat breaks, the ball usually goes back to the bowler.
on the off stump line, placed to backward point
swung down to long on
bouncer and Kemp can't connect with his pull shot
yorker, on the middle, punched down to long on
full and outside off, sliced over point. Pollock backed away to leg and made room for himself.
full and straight, on the middle, Pollock shuffles across, tickles it past square leg
on the middle and leg, turned to Sehwag at midwicket
up up and over. Another one is sucked over the long-on ropes. 21st six of the game. Floated up, outside off and Kemp slogs it across the line.

Dropped. By the young substitute fielder at long leg. Flighted delivery, on the middle and leg, Kemp went for a slog sweep, skies it to left at long leg where the fielder ran, didn't judge properly and had to thow in a dive but couldn't hold on.
on the middle and leg, dabbed to the on side
worked to the on side for a single
on the middle and leg, pushed to mid off
full and fast, on the leg, tickled past square leg and they run hard
on the leg side, Kemp goes down on his knee and sweeps it away to fine leg boundary
on the middle and leg, worked to Rafique at short fine leg
on the middle, Kemp shapes to sweep, edges it towards midwicket where Sehwag makes the stop, fires in a throw at striker's end, misses.
shout for lbw but it pitched outside leg. Rafique is bowling over the wickets. Lands outsdie leg, turns in, Kemp tries to sweep, misses and it runs off the pad
Reverse sweep. On the leg stump line, fullish and Pollock drives through the cover region!
slipping on the leg side, Kemp sweeps , Yuvraj moves to his right at long leg to make a diving stop. Gets up quickly, fires in a quick throw. Both teams eager to win.
The crafty Rafique da cleans up Kemp, puts Asia ahead. Yorker. On the middle line and Kemp, who tried his darn best to make a game out this, played all over it.

fires it in quick, rapped on the pads. Another dot ball. Rafique's 10 overs is over. 4 for 65. Impressive effort under the conditions. What a tireless bowler. There is nothing dramatic about his bowling, he is not going to make the ball jump and spit around but he would do enough to harass you.

low full-toss, on the off stump line, drilled to right of Yuvraj at long off. Yuvi moves smartly, picks the ball and fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Chigumbura has made his crease just in time.
Would you believe it, Yuvraj bas dropped a dolly. Short of length, on the off stump line and Pollock carves it straight to long off but Yuvi makes a mess of it.
bouncer that sails high over the batsman's head.

short in length, Chigumbura has heave across the line, gets it to widish long on, The young substitute fielder rushes back from midwicket, Rafique comes in from long on, sees the eager eyed youngster running madly, leaves the catch for him but the sub was nowhere near despite a desperate drive
full and straight, tries to off drive, gets a inside edge to fine leg
banged in short, Chgiumbura tries to pull, the bat meets air, the ball head to Dhoni
full and on the legs, flicked away to Yuvraj at long leg

And then they were three. Chigumbura has a wild heave across the line, Harbhajan had slowed the pace of the delivery - doosra incidentally, and Chigumbura is through with his shot early and the ball goes on to disturb the timber.
full, right up there at the blockhole, scooped out to long on
floated in on the middle, swept to left of Yuvraj at long leg

driven to midwicket where the young sub , a local player, (unfortunately I can't recognise him) has a shy at the non striker's end but misses. Had it hit, there would have been a party at the young man's house.
Botha goes for the reverse sweep. Gets it past point. It has been that kind of a strange night.
gets a single with a drive to long on
backs away to the leg side, Jayasuriya fires it on the leg side, tickles it to short fine leg. Fifty up for Polly.
low full toss, on the leg side and paddled away to fine leg boundary
Botha goes straight down the ground. Drills a fullish one past the bowler, the long on can't cut it down either.
dot ball. On the off and middle,driven abck to the bowler
again right up there at the yorker length, driven to long off
yet another strangling delivery, in the blockhole length, jabbed back to the bowler
low full-toss, on the middle, Botha shapes to play it across the line, gets a leading edge to cover region
Please whistle. That's the 22nd six of the night. Full and straight and Pollock manages to get under the ball and drills it over long on

Asia have cleaned up the series. Full and on the stumps, Pollock backs away, drills but straight to long off. The players from both team shake hands. Mahela is out there, congratulating Rafique in particular. Celebration in the Asian camp.
